name: Bang Bang VR
description:
Destroy the enemy cannon before they destroy you!

Description
You are in control of a cannon. Load it, aim it, shoot it! Your target is the enemy cannon at the other side of the map. 

This game has only been tested on HTC Vive. 

Future Ideas

  • Multiplayer
    • 1 vs 1
    • Crew vs crew
  • Multiple maps
  • Different types of cannons.
  • Destructible environment
  • Upgradable/customizable cannons
  • Customizable character (multiplayer)

DISCLAIMER: This is a prototype! Do not expect a full game.
